page.title: 16BICESTER'S ADMINISTRATION
page.content: GOVERNMENT:Administration is by Bicester Town Council,consisting of 12 members who hold evenings to consider plans referred from the Cherwell DistricCouncil.Copies of Planning Applications are on deposit for public inspection during normal office hours. The Council offices are at Waverley House in Queen's Avenue.Bicester comes under the jurisdiction of Cherwell District Council at Banbury. The town has a coat of arms.It is a crest of a wreath of colours in front ofa fox's mask and 2 stalks of wheat. The motto is UT TIBISIC ALIIS - unto thyself, so to others.
